Package accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.service

Class MessageService

java.lang.Object
accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.service.MessageService
@Service public class MessageService extends Object
This class is responsible for managing messages. It is annotated with @Service to indicate that it's a Spring managed service. It uses MessageRepository and UserRepository to interact with the database.

  • Method Details

    • getMessages

      @Cacheable("messages") public List<Message> getMessages()
      Retrieves all messages.
      Returns:
      A list of all messages.

    • getMessageById

      @Cacheable(value="messages", key="#messageId") public Message getMessageById(Long messageId)
      Retrieves a message by its ID.
      Parameters:
      messageId - The ID of the message to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The retrieved message.

    • getMessagesByContent

      @Cacheable(value="messages", key="#content") public List<Message> getMessagesByContent(String content)
      Retrieves messages by their content.
      Parameters:
      content - The content of the messages to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The retrieved messages.

    • getSortedMessagesBySenderId

      @Cacheable(value="messages", key="#root.methodName + #senderId") public List<Message> getSortedMessagesBySenderId(Long senderId, String order)
      Retrieves messages sent by a specific user and sorts them.
      Parameters:
      senderId - The ID of the sender.
      order - The order to sort the messages in.
      Returns:
      The retrieved and sorted messages.

    • getSortedMessagesByReceiverId

      @Cacheable(value="messages", key="#root.methodName + #receiverId") public List<Message> getSortedMessagesByReceiverId(Long receiverId, String order)
      Retrieves messages received by a specific user and sorts them.
      Parameters:
      receiverId - The ID of the receiver.
      order - The order to sort the messages in.
      Returns:
      The retrieved and sorted messages.

    • sendMessage

      @CacheEvict(value="messages", allEntries=true) public Message sendMessage(Long senderId, Long receiverId, String content)
      Sends a message from one user to another.
      Parameters:
      senderId - The ID of the sender.
      receiverId - The ID of the receiver.
      content - The content of the message.
      Returns:
      The sent message.
